article_title: Utah's Reversal Means Most States Now Support Obamacare Expansion

article_metadata.description: It may have taken nearly four years, but a majority of states have now committed to some form of Obamacare's Medicaid expansion. The tipping point? Utah Governor Gary Herbert's Thursday announcement to--grudgingly--accept the Affordable Care Act's dollars in order to expand coverage in his state. “Doing nothing is not an option,” said [...]
article_metadata.author: Dan Diamond
